title: AI-Powered Code Review Assistant
shortDescription: Intelligent code review tool that automatically analyzes pull requests for bugs, security vulnerabilities, and performance issues
fullDescription: Develop an AI-driven code review system that integrates with GitHub/GitLab to automatically analyze pull requests. The system uses large language models to understand code context, detect potential bugs, security vulnerabilities, performance bottlenecks, and suggests optimal solutions. It learns from your team's coding patterns and provides personalized recommendations while explaining the reasoning behind each suggestion.
architecture: Microservices architecture with FastAPI backend, React frontend, PostgreSQL for user data, Milvus for vector embeddings, Redis for caching, Celery for async tasks, Kubernetes for orchestration

timeline.title: Setup
timeline.description: Project architecture and GitHub app setup

timeline.title: Code Analysis
timeline.description: Build AST parser and code analyzer

title: Sustainable Supply Chain Tracker
shortDescription: Blockchain-based platform for tracking product sustainability metrics from source to consumer
fullDescription: Create a decentralized application that tracks environmental impact, ethical sourcing, and carbon footprint of products throughout the supply chain. The platform uses smart contracts to verify sustainability claims, provides immutable audit trails, and allows consumers to scan QR codes to view complete product histories. Integrates IoT sensors for real-time temperature, humidity, and location tracking of sensitive goods.
architecture: Ethereum/Polygon smart contracts, Node.js backend, Next.js frontend, IPFS for document storage, The Graph for indexing blockchain data, IoT sensors for tracking

title: AI Personal Health Coach
shortDescription: Intelligent health platform combining wearable data, nutrition tracking, and personalized AI coaching
fullDescription: Build an advanced health coaching system that integrates with wearables, analyzes biometric data, tracks nutrition, and provides personalized workout plans. Uses machine learning to predict health risks, optimize training loads, and provide real-time form correction through computer vision. Includes meal planning with computer vision-based food recognition and personalized nutrition recommendations based on genetic markers.

title: Crypto AI Trading Bot
shortDescription: Autonomous cryptocurrency trading system using reinforcement learning and sentiment analysis
fullDescription: Develop an intelligent trading bot that uses deep reinforcement learning to execute profitable cryptocurrency trades. The system analyzes on-chain data, social media sentiment, market patterns, and macro indicators to make autonomous trading decisions. Includes risk management algorithms, portfolio optimization, and backtesting engine. Supports multiple exchanges and provides real-time performance monitoring.

title: Smart City Traffic Optimization
shortDescription: AI-powered traffic management system using computer vision and IoT sensors for smart cities
fullDescription: Create an intelligent traffic management platform that uses computer vision to analyze traffic flow, optimize traffic light timing, and reduce congestion. Integrates with IoT sensors, traffic cameras, and emergency vehicle systems. Provides predictive analytics for traffic patterns, real-time rerouting suggestions, and integration with navigation apps. Includes pedestrian and cyclist safety features.

title: AI Mental Health Support Assistant
shortDescription: Empathetic AI chatbot providing mental health support with crisis detection and therapeutic exercises
fullDescription: Build an advanced mental health support chatbot that uses empathetic AI to provide emotional support, CBT exercises, and crisis detection. The system analyzes conversation patterns to detect distress signals, provides personalized coping strategies, and escalates to human professionals when needed. Includes mood tracking, mindfulness exercises, and integration with therapy platforms.

title: AR Remote Assistance Platform
shortDescription: Augmented reality platform for remote technical support and field service assistance
fullDescription: Create an AR-powered remote assistance platform that enables technicians to get real-time visual guidance from experts. Uses computer vision to recognize equipment, overlay instructions, and annotate live video. Includes 3D model visualization, step-by-step guidance recording, and integration with IoT sensors for equipment diagnostics.

title: Autonomous Drone Inspection System
shortDescription: AI-powered drone system for automated infrastructure inspection and defect detection
fullDescription: Build an autonomous drone platform that performs routine inspections of infrastructure (bridges, power lines, wind turbines) using computer vision. Features autonomous navigation, obstacle avoidance, real-time defect detection, and 3D mapping. Includes mission planning, automated reporting, and integration with maintenance management systems.

title: Voice Biometric Authentication System
shortDescription: Secure voice-based authentication system using deep learning for voiceprint recognition
fullDescription: Develop a state-of-the-art voice biometric system that authenticates users based on unique voice characteristics. Uses deep neural networks to create voiceprints, detects spoofing attacks, and provides continuous authentication. Includes anti-spoofing, noise cancellation, and integration with existing authentication systems. Perfect for banking and high-security applications.

title: Decentralized Identity Verification System
shortDescription: Self-sovereign identity platform using blockchain and zero-knowledge proofs for secure verification
fullDescription: Build a decentralized identity system that gives users control over their personal data. Uses zero-knowledge proofs to verify credentials without revealing underlying data. Implements W3C standards for decentralized identifiers (DIDs) and verifiable credentials. Includes government ID verification, biometric binding, and selective disclosure.

title: Federated Learning Platform
shortDescription: Privacy-preserving machine learning platform that trains models across decentralized devices
fullDescription: Create a federated learning system that enables training ML models across distributed devices without centralizing sensitive data. Implements secure aggregation, differential privacy, and model compression. Perfect for healthcare, finance, and IoT applications where data privacy is critical. Includes experiment tracking, model versioning, and deployment pipelines.

title: Autonomous Retail Analytics Platform
shortDescription: AI-powered retail analytics system using computer vision for customer behavior analysis
fullDescription: Build an intelligent retail analytics platform that uses computer vision to understand customer behavior, optimize store layouts, and reduce theft. Tracks dwell time, heat maps, demographic analysis, and product interactions. Includes inventory monitoring, queue management, and personalized promotions through digital signage integration.

title: Green Energy Grid Optimizer
shortDescription: AI platform for optimizing renewable energy distribution and storage in smart grids
fullDescription: Develop an intelligent energy management system that optimizes the distribution of renewable energy across smart grids. Uses reinforcement learning to balance supply and demand, predict energy production from weather data, and optimize battery storage. Includes real-time monitoring, demand response, and integration with IoT sensors.

title: Neuro-Symbolic AI Reasoning Engine
shortDescription: Hybrid AI system combining neural networks with symbolic reasoning for explainable decisions
fullDescription: Create a cutting-edge AI system that combines deep learning with symbolic reasoning to provide explainable decisions. Implements neural-symbolic integration where neural networks learn patterns while symbolic components ensure logical consistency. Perfect for medical diagnosis, legal analysis, and scientific discovery requiring transparent reasoning.

title: Digital Twin for Smart Manufacturing
shortDescription: Real-time digital twin platform for predictive maintenance and process optimization
fullDescription: Build a comprehensive digital twin platform that creates virtual replicas of manufacturing equipment and processes. Uses IoT sensors, machine learning, and real-time simulation to predict failures, optimize production, and reduce downtime. Includes 3D visualization, predictive maintenance, and what-if scenario analysis.

title: Quantum Machine Learning Framework
shortDescription: Framework for implementing and testing quantum machine learning algorithms
fullDescription: Develop a framework that enables classical ML practitioners to experiment with quantum machine learning. Implements hybrid quantum-classical algorithms, quantum neural networks, and variational quantum circuits. Includes simulators for testing, visualization of quantum states, and seamless integration with classical ML libraries.

title: Advanced Deepfake Detection System
shortDescription: Multi-modal deepfake detection platform using temporal and spatial analysis
fullDescription: Build a state-of-the-art deepfake detection system that analyzes videos and audio for synthetic manipulation. Uses ensemble methods combining facial motion analysis, audio-visual synchronization, and digital forensics. Includes real-time detection API, explainability features, and blockchain-based verification for content authentication.

title: Autonomous Vehicle Perception Stack
shortDescription: Complete perception system for autonomous vehicles using multi-sensor fusion
fullDescription: Create a comprehensive autonomous vehicle perception system that fuses data from cameras, LiDAR, and radar. Implements object detection, lane detection, depth estimation, and sensor fusion. Includes SLAM for localization, path planning, and real-time visualization. Designed for educational and research purposes.

title: Secure Multi-Party Computation Platform
shortDescription: Privacy-preserving computation platform enabling collaborative data analysis without sharing raw data
fullDescription: Build a platform that enables multiple parties to jointly compute functions over their private data without revealing individual inputs. Implements MPC protocols for secure aggregation, private set intersection, and oblivious transfer. Applications include privacy-preserving ad targeting, collaborative ML training, and sealed-bid auctions.

title: AI-Powered Drug Discovery Platform
shortDescription: Deep learning platform for de novo drug design and molecular property prediction
fullDescription: Develop an AI platform that accelerates drug discovery through generative models and molecular simulations. Uses graph neural networks for molecular property prediction, variational autoencoders for de novo molecule generation, and reinforcement learning for lead optimization. Includes visualization tools for 3D molecular structures and protein-ligand interactions.

title: Edge AI Model Deployment Platform
shortDescription: Platform for optimizing and deploying AI models on edge devices
fullDescription: Create a comprehensive platform that enables ML engineers to deploy models on edge devices (mobile, IoT, microcontrollers). Implements model compression, quantization, pruning, and hardware-specific optimization. Includes model zoo, benchmark suite, and real-time monitoring. Supports multiple frameworks and hardware backends.

title: DeFi Yield Optimizer
shortDescription: Automated yield farming optimizer using cross-chain strategies
fullDescription: Build an intelligent DeFi platform that automatically optimizes yield farming strategies across multiple blockchains. Analyzes APY, gas costs, impermanent loss, and protocol risks to maximize returns. Implements automated portfolio rebalancing, strategy backtesting, and gas optimization. Supports major DeFi protocols and cross-chain bridges.

title: Climate Change Impact Modeling Platform
shortDescription: AI-powered platform for predicting and visualizing climate change impacts
fullDescription: Develop a platform that uses machine learning to model climate change impacts on local and global scales. Predicts temperature changes, extreme weather events, sea level rise, and agricultural impacts. Provides interactive visualizations for policymakers and the public. Integrates satellite imagery, historical climate data, and emissions scenarios.

title: Personal Knowledge Graph System
shortDescription: Intelligent personal knowledge management system using graph databases and NLP
fullDescription: Build a next-generation knowledge management system that automatically builds a personal knowledge graph from notes, documents, and web content. Uses NLP to extract entities, relationships, and concepts. Features intelligent search, knowledge discovery, and spaced repetition for learning. Includes browser extension, mobile app, and API.

title: Intelligent Robotic Process Automation
shortDescription: AI-powered RPA platform for automating complex business workflows
fullDescription: Create an intelligent RPA platform that combines computer vision, NLP, and workflow automation. Automates repetitive tasks across web applications, desktop software, and documents. Features visual workflow builder, conditional logic, error handling, and human-in-the-loop approval. Includes process mining to discover automation opportunities.

title: Privacy-Preserving Smart Home Hub
shortDescription: Local-first smart home hub with on-device AI and privacy protection
fullDescription: Build a privacy-focused smart home hub that processes all data locally without cloud dependencies. Implements on-device voice recognition, computer vision, and automation. Uses federated learning for improvement while keeping data private. Compatible with major IoT protocols and existing smart home devices.

title: Generative Design Studio
shortDescription: AI-powered design platform for generating 3D models and product designs
fullDescription: Develop a generative design platform that creates optimized 3D models and product designs based on constraints and objectives. Uses generative adversarial networks, variational autoencoders, and evolutionary algorithms. Integrates with CAD software and 3D printers. Includes physics simulation, stress analysis, and material optimization.

title: Autonomous Drone Delivery System
shortDescription: End-to-end system for autonomous drone package delivery with safe landing site detection
fullDescription: Build a complete autonomous drone delivery system including route planning, obstacle avoidance, and precision landing. Uses computer vision for safe landing site detection and package authentication. Includes fleet management, weather integration, and customer tracking portal. Implements redundancy and emergency procedures.

title: AI Fairness and Bias Detection Toolkit
shortDescription: Comprehensive toolkit for detecting and mitigating bias in machine learning models
fullDescription: Create a platform that helps data scientists detect and mitigate bias in their ML models. Provides metrics for fairness assessment, bias detection algorithms, and debiasing techniques. Includes interactive visualizations to understand model behavior across demographic groups. Supports major ML frameworks and provides compliance reporting.

title: Privacy-Preserving Synthetic Data Generator
shortDescription: Generate high-quality synthetic data with differential privacy guarantees
fullDescription: Build a platform that generates realistic synthetic data while preserving privacy guarantees. Uses generative AI models trained with differential privacy to create tabular, time-series, and text data. Includes quality metrics, privacy auditing, and integration with popular data science tools. Perfect for software testing, ML training, and data sharing.

title: Computer Vision Quality Control System
shortDescription: AI-powered visual inspection system for manufacturing quality control
fullDescription: Develop an automated visual inspection system that detects defects in manufactured products using computer vision. Implements few-shot learning for rapid adaptation to new products, anomaly detection for novel defects, and active learning to improve with human feedback. Supports multiple camera types and lighting conditions.

title: Decentralized Social Media Platform
shortDescription: User-owned social media platform built on blockchain with content monetization
fullDescription: Create a decentralized social media platform where users own their content and data. Implements token-based incentives for creators, NFT integration for digital collectibles, and decentralized storage for content. Features content moderation through DAO voting, private messaging with end-to-end encryption, and cross-platform federation.

title: Wildlife Conservation AI Platform
shortDescription: AI-powered platform for monitoring and protecting endangered species
fullDescription: Build a conservation platform that uses computer vision and audio analysis to monitor wildlife. Processes camera trap images for species identification, analyzes audio recordings for biodiversity assessment, and predicts poaching risks. Provides ranger patrol optimization, real-time alerts, and population tracking. Integrates with satellite imagery for habitat monitoring.

title: Personal AI Assistant with Memory
shortDescription: Context-aware AI assistant with long-term memory and personalized responses
fullDescription: Develop a personal AI assistant that maintains long-term memory of conversations and user preferences. Uses RAG architecture with vector databases for personalized responses, learns user patterns, and proactively offers assistance. Integrates with calendars, emails, and productivity tools. Features voice interface, multi-modal capabilities, and privacy-focused local processing options.

title: Precision Agriculture Platform
shortDescription: IoT and AI platform for optimizing crop yield and resource usage
fullDescription: Create a comprehensive precision agriculture platform that combines IoT sensors, satellite imagery, and machine learning. Monitors soil conditions, weather, and crop health in real-time. Provides irrigation optimization, pest prediction, fertilizer recommendations, and yield forecasting. Includes drone integration for field scouting and automated spraying.

title: Zero Trust Security Platform
shortDescription: Modern zero trust security implementation with continuous verification
fullDescription: Build a comprehensive zero trust security platform that implements 'never trust, always verify' principles. Features continuous authentication, micro-segmentation, least privilege access, and real-time threat detection. Includes identity-aware proxies, device posture checking, and automated incident response. Integrates with existing identity providers and SIEM systems.

title: AI Sports Coach Platform
shortDescription: Computer vision-based sports coaching and performance analysis
fullDescription: Develop an AI-powered sports coaching platform that analyzes athlete performance through computer vision. Provides real-time feedback on technique, tracks biometric data, and creates personalized training plans. Supports multiple sports with specialized analysis for each. Includes game strategy analysis, opponent scouting, and injury prevention.

title: Enterprise Carbon Footprint Tracker
shortDescription: Comprehensive carbon accounting and reduction platform for businesses
fullDescription: Build an enterprise platform for tracking, reporting, and reducing carbon emissions across Scope 1, 2, and 3. Automates data collection from utilities, supply chains, and business travel. Uses ML for emission factor recommendations, identifies reduction opportunities, and generates compliance reports. Integrates with ERP systems and provides sustainability analytics.

title: Autonomous Warehouse Robot Fleet
shortDescription: Multi-robot system for automated warehouse operations
fullDescription: Create a fleet management system for autonomous warehouse robots performing picking, sorting, and inventory tasks. Implements multi-robot coordination, collision avoidance, and task allocation. Uses computer vision for item recognition and SLAM for navigation. Includes simulation environment, real robot integration, and warehouse management system integration.

title: Blockchain Smart Contract Auditor
shortDescription: Automated security analysis tool for smart contract vulnerabilities
fullDescription: Build an automated smart contract auditing platform that detects security vulnerabilities using static analysis, symbolic execution, and fuzzing. Supports multiple blockchains and contract standards. Provides detailed reports with exploit scenarios, gas optimization suggestions, and severity ratings. Includes continuous monitoring for deployed contracts.

title: Emotion Recognition for Autism Therapy
shortDescription: Assistive technology for emotion recognition and social skills training
fullDescription: Develop an assistive technology platform that helps individuals with autism recognize and respond to emotions. Uses computer vision for real-time facial expression analysis and AR for visual feedback. Includes social story creation, interactive games, and progress tracking. Provides customizable interfaces and sensory-friendly design.

title: Federated Analytics Platform
shortDescription: Privacy-preserving analytics on distributed data without centralization
fullDescription: Create a platform that enables data analysis across distributed datasets without moving raw data. Implements federated statistical queries, secure aggregation, and differential privacy. Allows data scientists to run analytics queries across multiple organizations' data while maintaining privacy and compliance. Includes visualization and collaboration features.

title: Computer Vision Restaurant System
shortDescription: AI-powered restaurant operations platform with computer vision
fullDescription: Build a comprehensive restaurant operations platform that uses computer vision to improve efficiency and customer experience. Tracks kitchen operations, monitors food quality, automates inventory, and analyzes customer behavior. Includes self-checkout, food recognition, and hygiene monitoring. Integrates with POS systems and delivery platforms.

title: Ethical Deepfake Generation Lab
fullDescription: Create an educational platform for understanding deepfake technology through hands-on experimentation. Provides tools to generate and detect deepfakes for research and education. Includes face swapping, lip syncing, and voice cloning with clear ethical guidelines and watermarking. Features detection benchmarks and adversarial training.
shortDescription: Educational platform for understanding and detecting deepfake technology

title: Autonomous Solar Panel Cleaner
shortDescription: Robotic system for automated solar panel cleaning and maintenance
fullDescription: Build an autonomous robotic system that cleans and maintains solar panel installations. Uses computer vision to detect dirt and damage, plans optimal cleaning paths, and monitors efficiency improvements. Features water conservation, weather integration, and fleet management. Includes ROI calculator and predictive maintenance.

title: Collaborative Data Science Platform
shortDescription: Real-time collaborative platform for data science teams
fullDescription: Create a modern collaborative platform for data science teams to work together on analysis, models, and visualizations. Features real-time notebook collaboration, version control for data and models, automated documentation, and peer review. Includes integrated compute environments, experiment tracking, and model registry. Designed for enterprise data science teams.

title: IIoT Predictive Maintenance Platform
shortDescription: Industrial predictive maintenance using vibration analysis and deep learning
fullDescription: Develop an industrial predictive maintenance platform that analyzes vibration, temperature, and acoustic data from machinery. Uses deep learning for anomaly detection, remaining useful life prediction, and failure mode classification. Features real-time monitoring, alerting, and maintenance scheduling. Supports multiple industrial protocols and edge processing.

title: Zero-Knowledge Rollup Bridge
shortDescription: Cross-chain bridge using zero-knowledge proofs for secure asset transfer
fullDescription: Build a secure cross-chain bridge using ZK-rollup technology for efficient and trustless asset transfers. Implements light client verification, fraud proofs, and optimistic verification. Supports multiple EVM chains with minimal gas costs. Features transaction batching, merkle proof generation, and comprehensive security measures.

title: VR Therapy Platform
shortDescription: Virtual reality platform for exposure therapy and mental health treatment
fullDescription: Create a VR therapy platform for treating anxiety, PTSD, and phobias through controlled exposure therapy. Features customizable environments, physiological monitoring, and therapist-controlled sessions. Includes biofeedback integration, session recording, and progress tracking. Designed for clinical use with safety features and comfort settings.

title: Automated Machine Learning Platform
shortDescription: End-to-end AutoML platform for automated model development and deployment
fullDescription: Build a comprehensive AutoML platform that automates the entire ML lifecycle from data preparation to deployment. Features automated feature engineering, model selection, hyperparameter tuning, and ensemble methods. Includes explainable AI, model monitoring, and continuous training. Designed for business users and data scientists.

title: Digital Product Passport System
shortDescription: Blockchain-based circular economy platform for product lifecycle tracking
fullDescription: Develop a digital product passport system that tracks products throughout their lifecycle for circular economy compliance. Records materials, repairs, and recycling information on blockchain. Enables consumers to verify sustainability claims and find repair services. Implements EU Digital Product Passport standards and QR code integration.

title: Occluded Object Detection System
shortDescription: Advanced computer vision for detecting partially obscured objects
fullDescription: Create a specialized object detection system that excels at identifying partially occluded objects in cluttered environments. Uses transformer-based architectures, amodal completion, and attention mechanisms. Perfect for retail shelf monitoring, warehouse inventory, and autonomous driving in crowded scenes. Includes synthetic data generation for training.

title: Homomorphic Encryption Analytics Engine
shortDescription: Privacy-preserving analytics on encrypted data using homomorphic encryption
fullDescription: Build an analytics engine that performs computations on fully homomorphically encrypted data without decryption. Enables organizations to analyze sensitive data while maintaining encryption throughout processing. Supports statistical operations, machine learning inference, and SQL-like queries on encrypted data. Includes performance optimizations and developer SDK.
